title: Snag It 9.1.0.206-serial incl(must have)
description:
Capture anything you see on the screen. Edit and combine those captures. Share them via your favorite applications. Organize and find them again later. The more you use Snagit, the more ways you'll find to use it! 

 

Capture
If you can see it, you can snag it

Don't waste time cropping your captures. Snag exactly what you need, with just a click.

Profiles make it easy. Snagit comes with eleven preset buttons that make screen capture a cinch! Capture a region of your screen, text from a window, the contents of a tall page that scrolls, all the images on a Web page, you get the idea.

Custom suits you. Don't feel limited by the eleven profilesÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¯Ã‚Â¿Ã‚Â½ÃƒÂ¯Ã‚Â¿Ã‚Â½create your own combinations for nearly unlimited capture possibilites. What's that? You want to set up a keystroke that captures a menu along with the mouse pointer...adds a drop shadow...and sends the image directly to yourblog? Sure, no problem!

System Requirements
Microsoft Windows 2000, XP, XP x64, or Vista (32-bit or 64-bit) installed and configured on your system. ~ Recommended: 
Internet Explorer 6.0 or later required. ~ Recommended: 
Windows 2000 users require Windows Installer 2.0. Click here for more details ~ Recommended: 
1.0 GHz processor (2.4 GHz recommended) ~ Recommended: 
512 MB of RAM (1 GB recommended) ~ Recommended: 
60 MB of free hard disk space (100 MB for CDROM installations due to video tutorials) ~ Recommended: 
SnagIt add-ins for Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint and Outlook work with Office 2000, Office XP or later. ~ Recommended: 
SnagIt add-in for Microsoft Internet Explorer works with Internet Explorer 6.0 or later. ~ Recommended: 
SnagIt plug-in for Adobe FrameMaker works with FrameMaker ~ Recommended: 
SnagIt requires Active Accessibility 2.0 to capture links from web pages. ~ Recommended:
